name: Noise Complaint
description:
Noise Complaint

You play as a very angry potato man who was woken up in the middle of the night by a very strange noise, it's you're job to find out what's making it and put an end to it before falling back asleep.

Game Jam

This game was made for the #potato-pc-game-jam and was created in 72 hours. It has a full custom soundtrack and is a fast paced somewhat stressful game.

Credits

Programming - Daegon Stam

Music - Dominic Dodge

Help with spritework - MathewHD https://mathewhd.itch.io/
